5#ifndef CYD_UI_LAZY_ALLOC_H
6#define CYD_UI_LAZY_ALLOC_H
7
8#include <functional>
9
10template<typename T, typename ...Args>
11struct lazy_alloc {
12 explicit lazy_alloc(Args... args) {
13 init = [args...](lazy_alloc &self) {
14 self.val = new T {args...};
15 };
16 }
17 ~lazy_alloc() {
18 delete val;
19 }
20
21 T* operator->() {
22 if (nullptr == val) {
23 init(*this);
24 }
25 return val;
26 }
27
28 operator T*() {
29 if (nullptr == val) {
30 init(*this);
31 }
32 return val;
33 }
34private:
35 std::function<void(lazy_alloc &)> init = [](lazy_alloc &self) {
36 self.val = new T {};
37 };
38 T* val = nullptr;
39};
40
41#endif //CYD_UI_LAZY_ALLOC_H
